attributes.action: Unpaid carers to receive cost of living payment or similar
attributes.additional_details: Unpaid carers save 132billion pounds a year, why should we be penalised when we are on a low income too, carers allowance is classed a benefit income.
attributes.background: Reconsider setting up a cost of living payment or similar for those receiving carers allowance in the uk

rejection.details: You may wish to sign this petition which calls for the same action: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/617537
